vehicle.description: Select the vehicles you want to add to the integration:

abort.already_configured: This account is already set up.

yaml_deprecated.title: Configuration of the Drivvo in YAML is deprecated
yaml_deprecated.description:
Configuration of Drivvo integration via YAML is deprecated.

Your configuration has been imported into the UI and can be removed from the `configuration.yaml` file and restart Home Assistant.

import_already_configured.title: Account {email} already exists
import_already_configured.description:
Account {email} already exists and therefore was not imported.

You can remove the configuration from your `configuration.yaml` file.

data.no_vehicles: There are no active vehicles on this account.
